titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: NON SMOKING CONFIRMATION STATUS INDICATOR AT 4 WEEKS - National Codes

strow.stentry: Yes - non-smoking status confirmed by carbon monoxide validation

stentry.p: No - non-smoking status not confirmed - attempt has been made to contact the PERSON for carbon monoxide validation or carbon monoxide validation done but non-smoking status not confirmed.
Not Applicable (e.g. PERSON self reports as smoker at 4 weeks, confirmation not attempted as telephone service only or they are 'lost to follow-up')
